welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Bedfordview, South Africa! This charming city is known for its beautiful parks, bustling markets, and delicious cuisine. We invite you to explore and experience all that Bedfordview has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Grand Central Airport handles both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Grand Central Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

airports.airport_name: Oliver Reginald Tambo International (Jan Smuts International)

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional and domestic flights.

wifi.note: Limited to 30 minutes per device per day.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pilanesberg Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Pilanesberg Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lanseria Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The General Aviation Terminal at Lanseria Airport is used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
